(Program 
  (Statement 
    (Declaration 
      (LexicalDeclaration 
        (VariableDeclarator 
          (Identifier "foo") 
          (TypeAnnotation 
            (TypeQuery 
              (Identifier "Bar"))))))) 
  (Statement 
    (Declaration 
      (LexicalDeclaration 
        (VariableDeclarator 
          (Identifier "bar") 
          (TypeAnnotation 
            (TypeIdentifier "G")))))))
